SELECT BH.BRRW_HIST_ID , BH.BRRW_ID , BH.PRDT_MNG_ID , TO_CHAR(BH.BRRW_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BRRW_DT , TO_CHAR(BH.RTN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RTN_DT , BH.DEL_YN , P.PRDT_NAME , P.PRDT_CTGR FROM BORROW_HISTORY BH INNER JOIN PRODUCT_MANAGEMENT PM ON BH.PRDT_MNG_ID = PM.PRDT_MNG_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRDT_ID = PM.PRDT_ID WHERE BH.RTN_DT IS NULL AND BH.BRRW_ID = #{_parameter} AND P.ONCE_YN = 'N' AND BH.PRDT_MNG_ID NOT IN ( SELECT PM.PRDT_MNG_ID FROM PRODUCT_MANAGEMENT PM LEFT OUTER JOIN APPROVAL_DETAIL AD ON PM.PRDT_MNG_ID = AD.PRDT_ID INNER JOIN APPROVAL A ON A.APPR_ID = AD.APPR_ID WHERE A.DMD_ID = #{_parameter} AND PM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND AD.DEL_YN = 'N' )
